interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Senegalese Twist Crochet Braids Wavy Twist Crochet Hair 14 Inch 5 Packs Wavy Ends free Synthetic Hair Extension Curly Crochet Twist Hair (1B#)
Review Date: 2020/12/22
Store: Liang Dian
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Liang Dian', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.78 x 8.35 x 2.64 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '738631321149'}
Review Text: I had never crocheted hair in before these, but I had no issues! The hair came with a crochet tool and the loops were wide enough to work with, I only had to expand them a little bit when installing. It took me about 2 hours and all of the packs to do my hair and I love the result! They are much lighter than box braids and very low maintenance. I have gotten a ton of compliments about how they look! The hair also came with some little multi-colored hair jewels to spice up the twists, which was a nice little gift from the vendor!
Review Title: Lightweight and so pretty!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set.
Natwag
{'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'}
This took off layers of foundation and contouring easily, but was soft on the skin while removing them. I like the loops on each pad because I can hook a finger through the loop to keep the pad in place while I wash my face.
Soft on skin, hard on makeup
Biutee Poly Nail Gel Kit 15ml 0.53oz Pink Nail Extension Gel Builder Gel Long Lasting Nail Salon Nail Art Design DIY at Home Beginner Friendly…
Biutee
{'Package Dimensions': '3.5 x 2 x 1.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces'}
The polygel is very sticky and hard to smooth out on the mold. I used nail polish remover in between nails to make it a little easier. Once the gel was finally applied, I was impressed, but the nails only lasted two days before falling off during daily activities like washing my hair and doing the dishes. And that was after I put dip powder on top of the polygel for color. Also note that this is only the gel, you have to order a mold separately to help put them on.
Not long lasting
3 Packs Braiding Hair Extensions 165G Jumbo Braiding Hair High Temperature Synthetic Fiber Jumbo Braiding Hair Extensions ( Blue)
UHair
{'Brand': 'UHair', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
I was a little worried because the packaging was ripped when it came. And this is the packaging that within the Amazon package. Luckily all 3 packs were there. I was also worried because the hair looked really plastic-y .Once I started using it though, it was really easy to work with! I ended up cutting the hair to make shorter box braids though because it was so long. I would recommend ordering 2 to cover your whole head. I needed 6 packs to do a full head of box braids.
Great for box braids!
6 Packs/Lot 26 Inch Pre-stretched Braiding Hair Professional Perm Yaki Synthetic Hair Braids(Ombre Brown Blond,#1B/30/27)
Alishow
{'Brand': 'Alishow', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '26 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '16.97 x 12.48 x 2.52 inches; 2.07 Pounds', 'UPC': '727196547491'}
This hair does not tangle much at all! It was great for making small box braids. I sealed the ends with boiling water which worked just fine. It took 2 rounds of dipping my hair in the water to seal them though. The hair is separated into bundles and separated with twist ties. I like the twist ties better than bundles that are separated with hair ties. The twist ties were easier to get off without tangling the hair. I used olive oil, edge control, and hair gel infused with castor oil to braid my hair. All of the products worked well with the hair. I would definitely get this again.
Great braiding hair!
Senegalese Twist Crochet Braids Wavy Twist Crochet Hair 14 Inch 5 Packs Wavy Ends free Synthetic Hair Extension Curly Crochet Twist Hair (1B#)
Liang Dian
{'Brand': 'Liang Dian', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '8.78 x 8.35 x 2.64 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '738631321149'}
I had never crocheted hair in before these, but I had no issues! The hair came with a crochet tool and the loops were wide enough to work with, I only had to expand them a little bit when installing. It took me about 2 hours and all of the packs to do my hair and I love the result! They are much lighter than box braids and very low maintenance. I have gotten a ton of compliments about how they look! The hair also came with some little multi-colored hair jewels to spice up the twists, which was a nice little gift from the vendor!
Lightweight and so pretty!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor reusable and eco-friendly beauty and hair care options, while actively exploring synthetic alternatives that offer versatility without sacrificing sustainability.

- **Skin Sensitivity:** They maintain a preference for gentle, all-skin-type products suitable for dry skin. Their positive experience with synthetic hair products showcases their adaptability as they prioritize usability alongside personal comfort.

- **Functionality:** The user values practicality and effectiveness, especially for hairstyling tools and hair extensions. Their latest experience with crochet braids demonstrates an interest in lightweight, low-maintenance options that enhance their hairstyling routine, highlighting their focus on ease of use and time efficiency.

- **Design Features:** They appreciate thoughtful design in product packaging and usability. Their satisfaction with accessories included with products, such as crochet tools and decorative elements, indicates a preference for items that enhance the overall user experience and convenience.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** The user is generally satisfied with their purchases, favoring durability and reliability. Their enthusiasm for lightweight hairstyles reflects a continuing commitment to effective and dependable beauty solutions.

- **Review Style:** They critically evaluate product performance based on usability, effectiveness, and overall experience, consistently emphasizing functionality in their beauty care and hairstyling assessments. Their recent review highlights a focus on the practical aspects of product installation and aesthetic appeal.
